body:
Welcome to the Notepad GitHub! This is the definitive resource for all things Notepad--from client to codebase. Whether you want to learn about Notepad's features or browse the source, you're in the right spot.

# User's Guide

* **Take Action:** [Report a bug, ask a question, or request a feature](mailto:appsforme@outlook.com).
* **Learn About Features:** Read about how to use Notepad's [current features](https://github.com/ireynolds/Notepad/wiki/Features-Page).
* **See What's New This version:** Read Notepad's [version history](https://github.com/ireynolds/Notepad/wiki/Version-History).
* **See What's Coming:** See the [future features](https://github.com/ireynolds/Notepad/issues?labels=enhancement&milestone=2&page=1&sort=created&state=open) that are coming in the next release.

# Developer's Guide

* **Check Out The Code:** [Browse](https://github.com/ireynolds/Notepad) the code. But, hey, why just browse it when you can [download it](https://github.com/ireynolds/Notepad/zipball/master) and [run it](https://dev.windowsphone.com/en-us/downloadsdk) on your own computer?
* **Track Milestones:** Follow the ongoing development of Notepad through [commit messages](https://github.com/ireynolds/Notepad/commits/master) and [filed issues](https://github.com/ireynolds/Notepad/issues?sort=created&state=open).
* **Join the Discussion:** [Get a GitHub account](https://github.com/signup/free) and start [adding issues](https://github.com/ireynolds/Notepad/issues/new) and commenting on ones that are already there. Help me flesh out ideas for how the new features will work! 

# Creeper's Guide

* **Stalk Me:** Track [stats](https://github.com/ireynolds/Notepad/graphs) about my coding behaviors (creepy, right?).
* **Don't Stalk Me:** You can also stay up to date with me by [emailing me](mailto:appsforme@outlook.com), visiting my [website](http://www.isaacreynolds.com), or browsing my LinkedIn [profile](http://www.linkedin.com/pub/isaac-reynolds/47/9/b6a).

Notepad's source is released under the [Microsoft Public License](http://opensource.org/licenses/ms-pl).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Notepad
